message.name: edit
message.details: When a message is edited, a log containing the original message content, and new message content, will be created, including details such as a jump link, the timestamp, and author

message.name: delete
message.details: When a message is deleted, a log containing the message content, author, and timestamp will be created. If the message was not known to the bot, no log will be created

message.name: bulk delete
message.details: When multiple messages are deleted at once, a log containing the number of messages deleted, and the timestamp will be created

membership.name: join
membership.details: When a member joins the server, a log containing basic membership information will be sent.
